input.sentences: today | we went to the fairmont olympic hotel to celebrate the holidays .
there was so much good food laid out | including appetizers !
my favorite appetizers were the shrimp kabobs with peanut dip sauce .
we all sat down at the big table to enjoy our three course fancy meals .
after eating a big dinner | we took a group picture in the lobby of the hotel .
output.sentences: Over the holidays we stayed at a huge hotel that had an olympic size swimming pool.
Another amenity included was food laid out for us each night.
My favorite was the shrimp with peanut sauce dip.
Though room service was nice we also went downstairs to sit at a table for some of our meals.
This was the last picture I took of all of us in t the hotel lobby.
